dependabot update -f input.yml --local . -o out.yml --updater-image ghcr.io/dependabot/dependabot-updater-silent
stderr 'created | dependency-a ( from 1.2.3 to 9.9.9 )'

-- manifest.json --
{
  "dependency-a": { "version": "1.2.3" }
}

-- input.yml --
job:
  package-manager: "silent"
  source:
    directory: "/"
    provider: github
    repo: dependabot/smoke-tests
